name: SaveTheWorld
description:
This is SaveTheWorld a game that was made in a gamejam in Luleå, sponsored by Mobilaris. The game was done in about 10 hrs of development time.

The theme of the gamejam was Ctrl-S save the world. In the game this is a core-mechanic.

Save the world is a puzzle-platformer with saving and restoring the the world using Ctrl-S and Ctrl-Z at it's core. The Ctrl-S binding is messy in the browser, but since it's is core to the theme of the game jam it stays.

Credits:

Johannes Perdahl - Sound Design, Composer

Anna Dunker - Level Design, Art Direction

Roy Sanderson - Programming

Gustav Englund - Programming
